name: Sea'Cret Waters
description:
Welcome to Sea'Cret Waters!

You play Enrico, a fisherman, who wish to fish as many fishes as possible.

But obstacles will make this harder...

To fish, you have to use the hook.

Moving the hook on fishes make them move.

Your score will be better as you group fishes before fishing them.

Try to get the best possible score!

P.S. : There is no restart button. If you wanna play again, just reload the page.

Game created for the Godot Wild Jam #41

Theme : Ocean | Time : 9days

Wildcards Included : Sound Of Y'all | Fishy Business | It's treeson then

Pixelsoba Programming

DevMele Programming
